forecast.name: Overnight

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 8am and 2pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 75. East wind 6 to 9 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday

forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely before 8pm, then rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms between 8pm and 5am, then a chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Light Rain Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 2pm and 5pm, then rain likely and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Mostly sunny. High near 77, with temperatures falling to around 75 in the afternoon. South wind 5 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms before 5am, then a chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
